title: Google\Cloud\Deploy\V1\GkeCluster
name: GkeCluster
description:
Information specifying a GKE Cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.deploy.v1.GkeCluster

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.cluster
params.description: Information specifying a GKE Cluster. Format is `projects/{project_id}/locations/{location_id}/clusters/{cluster_id}.

params.name: data.internal_ip
params.description: Optional. If true, cluster is accessed using the private IP address of the control plane endpoint. Otherwise, the default IP address of the control plane endpoint is used. The default IP address is the private IP address for clusters with private control-plane endpoints and the public IP address otherwise. Only specify this option when cluster is a private GKE cluster.
